code: export var fadeIn=function fadeIn(element,property,targetValue,duration){var startValue=parseInt(window.getComputedStyle(element)[property]);var distance=targetValue-startValue;var startTime=performance.now();function animationStep(){var elapsed=performance.now()-startTime;var progress=Math.min(elapsed/duration,1);var currentValue=startValue+distance*progress;var currentOpacity=1*progress;element.style[property]="".concat(currentValue,"px");element.style['opacity']=currentOpacity;if(progress<1){requestAnimationFrame(animationStep);}}requestAnimationFrame(animationStep);};
